title: Book Store
subtitle: Let's find some good stories to read.
loadingFailedMessage:
Failed to load available books.
Please try again later.

confirmation.title: Install Confirmation
confirmation.message:
Are you sure that you want to install this available book?
Doing so will use %{fileSize} of data.
confirmation.noButtonAriaLabel: no, don't install the available book

confirmation.title: Uninstall Confirmation
confirmation.message:
Are you sure that you want to uninstall this available book?
Any audio tracks that you may have added will be lost.
confirmation.noButtonAriaLabel: no, don't uninstall the Available book
